name: Butatsch
description: The Butatsch is a gargantuan aberration that has a formidable physical presence and is adept at ambush tactics. It wields a unique ability known as Immolating Gaze, enabling it to inflict fire damage and ongoing fire effects on multiple targets. It also has multiple eyes, contributing to its perceptive capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to blend powerful melee attacks with ongoing fire damage creates constant pressure on opponents, while its truesight and Thousands of Eyes make it extremely difficult to ambush.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its environment by ambushing intruders and using area denial tactics.
relations: Likely serves other aberrations or commands lesser creatures in its domain.
environment: Can be found in subterranean lairs or areas where it can effectively utilize its ambush tactics and swimming capability.
strengths: High resilience and advantage on perception checks make it a formidable opponent in combat scenarios.
weaknesses: Slow movement speed on land limits its mobility compared to faster creatures.
attacks: Multiattack includes an Immolating Gaze followed by powerful slam attacks, dealing both bludgeoning and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Immolating Gaze allows it to target multiple creatures with potential ongoing fire damage, creating a significant tactical advantage.
senses: Truesight up to 120 feet enhances its awareness and counters illusions.
skills: Exceptional perception skill with a +13 modifier enables it to detect hidden foes effectively.
additional_information: Immunity to acid and fire damage makes it resilient against common elemental attacks.
The Ingest ability allows it to swallow creatures for additional damage and control over them.
High Constitution score provides superior resilience against health-draining effects.
Bludgeoning resistance further enhances its durability in combat.
test_queries: monster with perception advantage and fire attacks
